subject: Baseball
Wages and Salaries
Free Agents (Sports)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: A second round of talks  left the Mets feeling optimistic about their chances of signing Johan Santana to a lucrative extension before their 72-hour negotiating window expires at 5 p.m. on Friday.
snippet: A second round of talks  left the Mets feeling optimistic about their chances of signing Johan Santana to a lucrative extension before their 72-hour negotiating window expires at 5 p.m. on Friday.
